first_translate: fiona... you look beautiful today as well.
I see  that your hair is down again.
it suits you very much.

hangle: 너 때문에 머리를 내린 거 알고 있지?
first_translate: do you know why I let my hair down like this?
me? no...
of course! because of me!

hangle: 내 담당 하녀가 아직 어리고 순진한 걸 다행으로 알아.
first_translate: be grateful  that your personal maid is young and naive.
alright then... I’ll try not to do anything bad from now on.
at least she’s willing to change her ways.
well anyway, please keep yourself out of trouble from now on.
sure thing, but only starting from now.
why are you smiling so widely, siegren?
haha...
your highness, lady fiona.
thank you for accepting our invitation tonight.
lady livia.
no, thank you for inviting us here.
the two of you must have some drinks first.
this peach cocktail happens to be one of my favorites too.
it's sweet and delicious.
it's sweet and delicious.
wow, thanks.
wait...
make mine non-alcoholic instead.
doesn’t his highness enjoy drinking alcohol?

hangle: 그건 아니지만, 오늘은 안 마시는 게 나을 것 같아서.
first_translate: not really, but I just don’t feel like having any tonight.
but still, thank you for offering, my lady.
indeed...
then may I ask if I can share a drink with your partner over there?
then may I ask if I can share a drink with your partner over here?
wow, how pretty!
if it’s just going to take a moment.
is there something you’d like to tell me?
my lady seems quite straightforward.
oh...
I forgot about all those formalities used by people in high society.
that’s what happens when you’re always blunt during combat.
by chance,
do you remember the promise we made before?

hangle: “절 도우면 영애가 사교계에서 입지를 다질 수 있도록 도와줄게요.”
first_translate: “if you help me, I will make sure to establish your position within high society.”
of course.
and if you agree,
can we renew that contract?
renew it?

hangle: 요즘… 황후 폐하가 눈치를 과하게 주신답니다.
first_translate: to be honest, lately her majesty has been giving me a hard time.
what did the empress say exactly?

hangle: 지금의 저는 황태자 전하를 쫓아낼 수 없는데요?
first_translate: right now, I’m unable to chase away the crown prince.

hangle: 물론 사람이 없는 장소에서 이미 한 대 때리기는 했지만.
first_translate: of course, I already slapped him once behind closed doors.

hangle: 나중에 제대로 복수도 할 거긴 하지만.
first_translate: I plan to get revenge later on,
but whether or not that would benefit you remains uncertain...
I understand.

hangle: 이번 경우에는 제가 영애의 가능성에 기대를 건다는 것에 가깝겠네요.
first_translate: for this case, I suppose I am placing more hope into your potential, my lady.

hangle: 저보다는 시그렌 전하에게 거는 게 낫지 않겠어요?
first_translate: maybe you should place your hopes in his highness rather than myself.
I prefer strong men.
while I'm sure his highness is also strong,

hangle: 제 두 눈으로 똑똑히 확인한 건 전하 쪽이 아니라,
first_translate: from what I saw firsthand,
it was actually your skills that were impressive.
and I witnessed them twice at that.
truthfully though,
I don’t think badly of his highness either.
but...
but?
he doesn’t even recognize my face,

hangle: 하물며 다른 여자과 연관시켜서 떠올리는 분은 싫거든요.
first_translate: let alone he remembers other women better than me.

hangle: 전에 시그렌 전하와 부딪힌 적이 있는데,
first_translate: when I ran into his highness previously,
as soon as he looked at my face,
ah, you’re friends with fiona--
that’s what he said right off the bat.

hangle: 이제껏 저를 한 번 보고 나서
first_translate: until now, every man who ever laid eyes on me...

hangle: 첫 번째로 떠올리지 못한 남자는 없었는데!
first_translate: ...remembered me immediately after seeing me once!

hangle: 저런 이야기를 하는데도 밉게 보이지가 않다니, 이것도 능력이야…
first_translate: even while saying such things, he somehow manages to appear likable... what skill is that?
anyway,

hangle: 제 미래의 ‘가능성’에 기대를 걸고 도움을 주겠다는 뜻이죠?
first_translate: you mean to say that you'll offer assistance based on my future "potential"?

hangle: 아쉽게도 프리실라 가문이 아닌 리비아의 도움이지만요.
first_translate: unfortunately, it won’t come from house priscilla, but from me personally.

hangle: 아버지는 어디까지나 중립의 위치를 지키려 하시니까요.
first_translate: my father wishes to remain neutral above everything else.

hangle: 그럼, 리비아 영애가 줄 수 있는 도움은 무엇인가요?
first_translate: then what kind of support could you provide, lady livia?

hangle: 피오나 영애와 제가 사교계에서 더 친밀한 사이가 되는 거겠죠.
first_translate: I believe becoming closer with lady fiona in high society would suffice.
then wouldn’t that simply mean...
...becoming good friends?
wh-what’s with this awkward silence?!
a-anyhow,
nice meeting you?
friend.
nice meeting you too,
lady fiona.
sieg-- ah,
your highness.
did I keep you waiting long?
no.
listen up, sieg.
lady livia asked me...
...to hang around together.
politically speaking, they wish to stay neutral,

hangle: 그거랑 별개로 황태자가 너무 싫어서 내 쪽에 힘을 실어주고픈 모양이야.
first_translate: but aside from that, apparently she hates the crown prince so much that she wants to give me extra support.

hangle: 누가 들을 수도 있으니 밖으로 가자.
first_translate: let’s go outside since someone might hear us talking.
I hate that bastard too.
still,

hangle: 너와 보낼 시간을 그 영애에게 빼앗기는 것도 싫은데.
first_translate: I dislike spending less time with you due to that woman.
what?

hangle: 에이. 뭐 그런 농담을 하고 그래?
first_translate: come on, stop joking around.
I wasn’t kidding.

hangle: 리비아 영애보다 나와 노는 게 더 재밌을 거야.
first_translate: I bet hanging out with me will be way more fun than being with lady livia.
I’ll work harder to ensure that.
huh...?
fiona.
